hangle: 이런 조그마한 애가 지키지 않으면 안 되는 상황이냐고!
first_translate: why does a little girl like you have to protect them?!
second_translate: Why does this little kid have to be the one protecting others?!

first_translate: well...
second_translate: Well...

first_translate: siegren!
second_translate: Siegren!

first_translate: I think I know why siegren is mad.
second_translate: I understand why Siegren is angry.

hangle: 작은 나를 전장에 보내는 게 거부감이 드는 거겠지.
first_translate: so he probably doesn’t like the idea of sending a child to the battlefield.
second_translate: He probably feels uncomfortable sending someone as small as me to the battlefield.

first_translate: what?
second_translate: …Why did you call me?

first_translate: I’m fine,
second_translate: I’m fine, so

first_translate: so don’t worry about me.
second_translate: Don't worry about it.

first_translate: what?!
second_translate: What?!

first_translate: aren’t you scared?
second_translate: Aren't you scared at all?

first_translate: but...
second_translate: But...

hangle: 난 여기가 아니면 갈 데가 없어.
first_translate: ...I have nowhere else to go.
second_translate: I have nowhere else to go but here.

first_translate: I needed a place to stay,
second_translate: I needed a place to belong.

first_translate: and house haylon needed a mage.
second_translate: And House Haylon needed a mage.

hangle: 서로 필요했을 뿐인 관곈데 왜 화가 나겠어?
first_translate: we just need each other. there’s no reason for me to be mad.
second_translate: It was just a relationship of mutual necessity, so why would anyone be angry?

first_translate: yeah.
second_translate: That's right.

hangle: 애초에 이곳에 남기로 한 건 내 결정이었다.
first_translate: I was the one who decided to stay here.
second_translate: I was the one who chose to stay here in the first place.

hangle: 날 전장에 보낸다고 화낼 이유도, 비판할 필요도 없다.
first_translate: there’s no reason for me to be mad or criticize them for sending me to the battlefield.
second_translate: There’s no reason to be mad or feel the need to criticize for being sent to the battlefield.

hangle: 나는 적당한 나이가 될 때까지 있을 곳이 필요했고,
first_translate: I needed a place to stay until I became an adult,
second_translate: I needed a place to stay until I reached a suitable age,

first_translate: and house haylon needed a strong mage.
second_translate: And House Haylon needed a powerful mage.

hangle: 중요한 건 오직 그 사실관계 뿐이다.
first_translate: that’s the only thing that matters.
second_translate: The only thing that matters is the fact itself.

first_translate: then what about your family?
second_translate: Then, what about your family?

first_translate: I’m an illegitimate child.
second_translate: I'm a bastard.

first_translate: my father and brothers sent me here...
second_translate: My father and my brothers sent me here.

hangle: 다시는 집으로 돌아오지 못하길 바라며 말이야.
first_translate: ...because they didn’t want me to come back home.
second_translate: ...because they never wanted me to return home.

hangle: 시그렌도 비슷한 경험을 했으니 이제 알겠지.
first_translate: siegren should know by now.
second_translate: Siegren should understand by now, having gone through a similar experience.

hangle: 세상엔 아이라는 이유로 자신을 보호해 줄 사람은 없고,
first_translate: no one will protect you just because you’re a child.
second_translate: No one in this world will protect you just because you're a child.

hangle: 스스로 몸을 지키려면 대가를 치러야 하는걸.
first_translate: you have to pay a price to protect yourself.
second_translate: You have to pay a price to protect yourself.

hangle: 세상에 이유 없는 호의는 없다는 걸.
first_translate: there’s no such thing as kindness without a reason.
second_translate: There's no such thing as kindness without a price.

first_translate: you could die...
second_translate: ...You could die.

first_translate: aren’t you scared?
second_translate: Aren't you afraid?

first_translate: if I die,
second_translate: If I die...

hangle: 내가 살아남을 수 없을 만큼 무능하다는 뜻이겠지.
first_translate: it just means I wasn’t strong enough to survive.
second_translate: It just means I was too incompetent to survive.

hangle: 어쨌든 내 선택으로 여기 있는 거야.
first_translate: anyway, I’m here because I chose to be.
second_translate: Anyway, I'm here because it was my choice.

first_translate: so don’t worry about me.
second_translate: So you don’t need to worry about me either.

first_translate: I’m fine.
second_translate: I'm perfectly fine.

first_translate: I’ll be back.

first_translate: be careful not to reopen your wound.
second_translate: Be careful not to aggravate your wound.

first_translate: eat well too.
second_translate: Eat well, too.

first_translate: what?!
second_translate: What?!

first_translate: you...
second_translate: You...

hangle: 이렇게 선을 그으면서도 날 걱정하는 이유가 뭐야?
first_translate: why are you worrying about me when you’re keeping a distance?
second_translate: Why do you worry about me even while keeping a distance?

first_translate: it’s normal to worry about someone who’s hurt, right?

first_translate: oh...

first_translate: come back soon...
second_translate: ...Come back soon.

second_translate: Siegren...?

second_translate: Oh, right!

second_translate: I'm sorry for being late, Jeron...

second_translate: Abel was here too?!

first_translate: he must have heard everything.
second_translate: He must have heard the conversation.

first_translate: is he... mad?!

hangle: 서둘러야 하는데 남자애랑 말씨름이나 하고 있었으니 그럴 만도 해!
first_translate: I was arguing with a boy when I should have been hurrying, so he has every right to be mad!
second_translate: I was arguing with a boy when I should have been hurrying, so it's understandable.

first_translate: I’m sorry I’m late.
second_translate: I'm sorry for being late.

first_translate: you...
second_translate: You...

first_translate: never mind.

first_translate: you must stay by my side when we get to the battlefield.
second_translate: You must not leave my side when we arrive at the battlefield.

hangle: 어차피 원래부터 전장에선 날 끼고 다녔으면서,
first_translate: he always keeps me by his side on the battlefield.

first_translate: why is he confirming it?

first_translate: okay.

second_translate: But...

second_translate: Why did you call me?
